docs.snippet: In accordance with the expansion of the passenger department of American Export Lines, John E. Bailey has been named to the newly created post of assistant general passenger manager. Mr. Bailey has been with the company since 1930, serving in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: In accordance with the expansion of the passenger department of American Export Lines, John E. Bailey has been named to the newly created post of assistant general passenger manager. Mr. Bailey has been with the company since 1930, serving in the passenger department except for his first year in the organization.

docs.snippet: Like many other types of companies, advertising agencies are haunted with the spectres of inefficient help, rapid turnover in employes and the inability of ecutives to keep pace with the rapidly-changing business scene. The larger agencies, though,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Like many other types of companies, advertising agencies are haunted with the spectres of inefficient help, rapid turnover in employes and the inability of ecutives to keep pace with the rapidly-changing business scene. The larger agencies, though, have gone to considerable pains in their efforts to eliminate the "bogymen."

docs.snippet: THIS is to assure the first twenty-five ladies who will arrive at the Roxy on Tuesday morning that the gifts of Ciro's "Acclaim" perfume they will receive are not regular procedure. They are but one facet of the management's celebration of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: THIS is to assure the first twenty-five ladies who will arrive at the Roxy on Tuesday morning that the gifts of Ciro's "Acclaim" perfume they will receive are not regular procedure. They are but one facet of the management's celebration of the theatre's twenty-fifth anniversary.

headline.main: BY WAY OF REPORT; Roxy Theatre Marks a Quarter Century -- New Vehicle for Brando -- Addenda

docs.snippet: A sharp break in British sterling which carried the spot pound off to $2.78, the official support price, and widened discounts on forwards more than a full cent at the bottom of the decline, jarred an otherwise even market in that unit most of last...
docs.lead_paragraph: A sharp break in British sterling which carried the spot pound off to $2.78, the official support price, and widened discounts on forwards more than a full cent at the bottom of the decline, jarred an otherwise even market in that unit most of last week. All of the action piled up Friday afternoon after London had closed.
